node.title: The Darwin shooting murder trial is over. These were the key moments before the surprise guilty plea
node.description: Benjamin Hoffmann changed his plea to guilty, which means his murder trial is now over. After weeks of evidence and hundreds of witnesses, here are the key pieces of evidence presented to the jury.
node.content:
["Benjamin Glenn Hoffmann sits in a locked Darwin prison cell, roughly 30km away from where he was arrested for killing four men in a drug-fuelled shooting spree.", "Over the past seven weeks, the 47-year-old has been travelling almost every day to the Northern Territory Supreme Court, where he was on trial after pleading not guilty to the\u00a0crimes.", "Then, on Tuesday, Hoffmann stunned the jury by changing his plea and\u00a0admitting to three counts of murder and one of manslaughter.", "The jury was dismissed. The trial was over.", "It's now up to Supreme Court Justice John Burns to decide how long Hoffmann will spend behind bars.", "Before then, here's a look at the key issues and pieces of evidence presented to the court before Hoffmann abandoned the trial.", "", "
Hoffmann has been in custody since his arrest in June, 2019.(Suppled)
", "
The jury heard detail about how each victim died
", "At the end of Hoffmann's\u00a0one-hour shooting spree across Darwin's inner suburbs on June 4, 2019, four men were dead.", "To make the case against Hoffmann, prosecutors presented weeks of harrowing evidence about the way\u00a0Hassan Baydoun, Michael Sisois, Nigel Hellings and Robert Courtney were killed.", "The first victim, 33-year-old caretaker Mr Baydoun, died in his room at the Palms Motel on the edge of the Darwin CBD.", "He was shot four times, including once to the head at close range.\u00a0", "Retired auto electrician Mr Hellings, 75, was killed in the kitchen of his Gardens Hill Crescent unit. He also had multiple bullet wounds.", "Prosecutors say Hoffmann then arranged to meet up with his friend and former colleague, 57-year-old Mr Sisois, at the Stuart Park Buff Club.", "CCTV was shown to the jury of\u00a0Hoffmann\u00a0pushing Mr Sisois in the pub's car\u00a0park, then shooting him.", "Hoffmann's fourth and final victim was 52-year-old former bodyguard Mr Courtney, who died at the Jolly Street recycling centre.", "There were 69 injuries across Mr Courtney's body, with half described as \"stab or slicing\" injuries.\u00a0", "", "
(Clockwise from top left) Robert Courtney, Hassan Baydoun, Michael Sisois and\u00a0Nigel Hellings.(Supplied)
", "Hoffmann pleaded guilty to the manslaughter of Mr Hellings and the murders of the other three men.", "
Hoffmann smoked ice prior to the shooting spree
", "Blood samples from Mr Hoffmann showed he had consumed a \"significant amount\" of methamphetamine prior to his arrest.", "Hoffmann's former lover told the jury she smoked ice with him the day before the murders. She said Hoffmann's mate, Mr Sisois, was also there.", "The woman said she smoked less than one ice pipe but it \"didn't taste right\" and she \"didn't feel good\" for the rest of June 3 and the first half of June 4.", "", "
Benjamin Glenn Hoffmann.(Supplied: Facebook)
", "
Hoffmann thought he'd been poisoned, and his lover's life was in danger
", "Hoffmann visited Royal Darwin Hospital four times between 1:00am and 5:00am the morning of the rampage, believing someone had poisoned his energy drink.", "Hoffmann later repeated this accusation to doctors, psychiatrists, and detectives. The court heard Hoffmann believed Mr Sisois was somehow involved in the poisoning.", "The jury also heard Hoffmann believed his former lover's life was in danger, that she'd be raped, abused and \"pimped out\". Hoffmann continues to make these claims in police and psychiatric interviews after the rampage. His former lover has rejected these allegations.", "", "
Alexandros Deligiannis had previously had a relationship with Hoffmann's lover.(ABC News: Che Chorley)
", "
The jury heard why Hoffmann was hunting 'Alex'
", "Several witnesses testified that Hoffmann was asking after a man called \"Alex\" during the shooting spree.", "Hoffmann's former workmates said he\u00a0also spoke about getting a gun and wanting to \"hurt\" someone called Alex prior to the rampage.", "Prosecutors told the court the person Hoffmann was hunting was Alex Deligiannis, the ex-boyfriend of Hoffmann's former lover.", "Mr Deligiannis previously lived and worked at the Palms Motel, where Mr Baydoun was murdered. He also previously lived in the same block of units on Gardens Hill Crescent where Hoffmann killed Mr Hellings.", "The court heard Hoffmann believed Mr Deligiannis was \"pimping out\" his lover, had been violent toward her and supplied her with methamphetamines.", "Mr Deligiannis, who took the stand in early October, denied all these accusations.", "", "
Michael \"Pelican\" Makrylos said he had known Ben Hoffmann \"a long time\".(ABC News: Che Chorley)
", "
Hoffmann's friend lent him a car with bullets, knife inside
", "Hoffmann's friend, Michael \"Pelican\"\u00a0Makrylos, told the court he lent Hoffmann his ute shortly before the shooting spree, despite knowing there was a Bowie knife and 50 shotgun cartridges unsecured in the back seat.", "Mr Makrylos said he drove Hoffmann around several times that day, including taking him to a car yard and a Palmerston shopping centre twice.", "Between these meetings, Mr Makrylos went to a gun store in\u00a0Coolalinga\u00a0and bought the knife and cartridges.", "Prosecutors said Mr Makrylos bought the knife to give to Hoffmann.\u00a0Mr Makrylos testified the knife was a gift for his daughter and the ammo for a hunting trip.", "The court also heard Hoffmann told prosecutors Mr Makrylos also provided him with the shotgun he used during the rampage,\u00a0a claim Mr Makrylos again denied.", "
Police were close to Hoffmann on the night of the attacks
", "Early in the trial, CCTV from a home in The Gardens and testimony from police officers revealed Hoffmann was, at times, not far from being caught.", "", "
The court heard police were close to Benjamin Hoffmann at points throughout the shooting spree.(Supplied: Supreme Court of the NT)
", "Footage shows a police car just two seconds behind the car prosecutors said Hoffmann was driving\u00a0after leaving the Palms Motel where Hassan Baydoun was murdered.", "NT Police Senior Constable Merwin Kazim even told the jury\u00a0he heard gunshots being fired in The Gardens\u00a0but didn't go into the Buff Club, where Michael Sisois was killed, because he thought it was \"fraught with danger\".", "After he'd killed four people, the court heard, Hoffmann eventually drove to Darwin's police headquarters in Berrimah, where he was caught on CCTV attempting to get inside.", "Jurors were later played audio of a triple-0 call Hoffmann made, telling Superintendent Lee Morgan he needed help, had been \"f**king poisoned\" and had \"killed sexual predators\".", "", "
Benjamin Hoffmann's triple-0 call to police.
", "At the Daly St intersection in the Darwin CBD, Constable Michael Kent met Hoffmann's car.", "His bodyworn camera captures him calmly coaxing the killer out of the car before tactical police officers tasered Hoffmann to the ground.", "
Two key forensic psychiatrists disagreed over state of mind
", "The key forensic expert for the prosecution and expert witness for the defence unsurprisingly disagreed on critical questions.", "The crown's forensic psychiatrist, Professor Greenberg, testified that Hoffmann \"understood\" what he was doing at the time of the shooting spree, was not out of touch with reality and was not psychotic.", "Professor Greenberg told the court\u00a0Hoffmann was \"primarily\" acting \"with retribution, with revenge, with anger, with rage\".", "Dr Kerri Eagle disagreed. She believed Hoffmann's \"primary motivator\" during the shooting spree was \"persecutory delusions\" and believed Hoffmann was psychotic at the time of the offending.", "\"I think everybody apart from me has failed to support a mental impairment defence,\" Dr Eagle said.", "", "
Bodycam footage shown to NT Supreme Court during trial of Benjamin Glenn Hoffmann in 2021.(Supplied)
", "For now, it's a waiting game.", "A date is yet to be set for the resumption of sentencing submissions.", "Last week, Crown Prosecutor Lloyd Babb SC said one of the crown's key reports would be ready in \"two to three weeks\" and then they'd attempt to lock in a date.", "Both the defence and prosecutors will give their own submissions: putting forward an argument for the length of time they believe Hoffmann should spend behind bars.", "He's facing a lengthy sentence because in the Northern Territory, anyone committing more than two murders faces a non-parole period of 25 years.", "Hoffmann will also need to serve time for the manslaughter of Mr Hellings and four other charges: one of threatening to kill and three of recklessly endangering life.", "Justice Burns will hand down the sentence at later date.", "But Hoffmann may spend the rest of his life behind bars.", "", "
Hoffmann has admitted to killing four men on June 4, 2019.(Supplied: Elizabeth Howell)
"]
